content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my front porch around 2 am talking on the phone. i was looking at the ground when i noticed it got a little brighter outside, when i looked up there was a giant blue oval light in the sky, at first i thought it was maybe a street light or a house light in the distance but the light was too high in the sky for it to be anything on the ground. the light didn't move it just glowed and it looked a little bit smaller than the moon. it stayed for about 11 seconds then got a little darker and just disappeared all together. i was shocked when i first saw it i couldn't  even speak to my friend on the phone she kept saying "hello" and i couldn't do anything but stare at this giant light. i tried to go to sleep after this but was just too creeped out.
content.summary: On the phone outside at night and noticed it got brighter outside and when i looked up there was a giant blue oval light in the sky it stayed for 11seconds then got a little bit darker and disapeared all together

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were driving home in parkville md and there were 3 objects in the sky flying in formation they were moving slow like helecopters. then the last object following behind in formation took off towards the other two then looked as if it flew into one of the other ones then it changed direction on a dime then took off in a different direction much faster then the other two in the opposite direction then it dissapered.While the other two helecopters kept going the same direction towards towson md.The object headed towards the east towards essex area.
i know im not crazy we both saw this happen.This happend around 8.30 pm and 9pm the other two helecopters had running lights with the red and green tail lights like a plane has. yet this object only had a bright white light on the front with no landing lights it was moving faster then any plane ive ever seen and turned left then right then left in a straight line not like a plane would do or a helecopter. then it disapeared from site.Did any one else see this besides us
content.summary: Started as 3 helicopters inline then 1 outran the other 2 then went thru 1 of them then flew faster then other 2 in a different direction

content.detailedDescription:
We lived in the woods 6 mi. from highway.  my husband had gone to work at 6 pm and as it was getting dark i went out to turn on the yard light. as i reached up to the switch i saw a large bright light over the trees (small 20 ft. oak trees ) there was a huge array of power lines running parallel with our property about a mile east...So i thought it was the power company doing something, and wondered why at night.  suddenly the light lifted and rising
up turned to the right to reveal another light and moving toward my position turned slightly again to reveal a 3rd light.  rising it moved to about a quarter of a block when it suddenly lifted up and shot out into space in a
se direction.....A soft hummmmmm was heard then which was the ony sound
that was made.
we had no phone but communicated with cb radio.  i went in to call a neighbor
but the radio was dead.

the object was spherical in shape and i was sure it was a ufo. i was actually more excited and not afraid.
content.summary: See detailed description

content.detailedDescription: Screenshot of the screen of a cell when i was watching the ustream app that transmitted live image of the international space station , the object was standing at the top , left corner. had cylindrical appearance , with blue light in the rear.
content.summary: Ufo near iss

content.detailedDescription: First noticed a pulsating object the night of march 18, 2015 while letting my dogs outside. i started to watch it with the naked eye, trying to determine what is was. after a few minutes i realized that it was not a plane or helicopter. this is when i got my camera and got the following images and videos. this object has been returning almost every night to generally the same area.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsating object that has been caught on video & photograph for 5 weeks.

content.detailedDescription: the object was a brown irregularly square shaped object hovering in the sw sky slightly westward from my position. the local objects were firing white beams of lights at it and it pretty much responding in kind. it was the first time i have seen this particular object in this our area. it was a darkly lit object and could be seen only when struck with beams of lights from our local objects. it did appear to have one or two square shaped windows on the one surface facing to me.  the local objects are always brightly lighted and easy to find. the unknown objects appear on in their own schedule, but here they have been showing more frequently and never the same at time of night. sometimes i wonder why i bother making these reports no one ever responds with more than a thank you note from headquarters. you would think with all the activities they would come and pay a visit or at the very least call from the stat head quarters.
content.summary: Several local ufo objects firing upon several unknow objects

content.detailedDescription: I was working on my truck and happened to look directly above and saw 2 spheres, one above the other, followed by a third at same altitude all in a perfect straight line traveling due north at approx 30mph maybe 200 ft high. it was 6:20 pm on march 30th 2014 and it was a crystal clear day. the objects i saw were crisp against the bright blue sky. they were perfectly round, were not attached to each other, silent, dull greyish color. they stood out against the sky. they were not balloons!!! i called a friend immediately to timestamp the event and drew a crude drawing. i viewed them only for a couple seconds until they went over the treeline.
content.summary: I just happened to look up at the right moment and 3 spheres silently past over

content.detailedDescription: I was walking through the savanna of uganda on vacation from turkmenistan, and i saw multiple ships shaped like human genitalia one for each gender. then the two ships landed in front of me. over 10 large genitalia like organisms exited the craft. then the ones shaped like genitalia of the opposite sex of each person there raped each of us and then left. before they left they said that the genitalia revolution was about to come, and said something about those ufo hunters getting tr0113d but the rest was in a different language incomprehensible to me.
content.summary: Multiple genetallia like spacehips

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching television and heard a prop plane flying overhead. it sounded strange which is why i grabbed my binoculars to take a look.
i noticed the plane was flying erratically in a circle, the only way i can describe it was a side to side motion. i was able to see the pilot through the large glass covered cockpit, such as that of a crop duster air plane.
after a few circular fly-bys by the plane i noticed the pilot was looking upward toward the sky above him, i then scanned the sky to where i assumed the pilot was looking and seen a very large chrome object hovering directly above my stand point. i could not see the object without my binoculars, but with them it appeared to be very large! distance was unknown but with my 10x42 powered binoculars it was highly visible and seemed huge.
it hovered for approximately two minutes, the went sw at a high rate of speed and the air plane followed until out of visual sight because of trees and homes.
i was in such disbelief at what i had just witnessed that i was shaken and explain it to my parents with tears in my eyes.

this is an experience i will never forget!
content.summary: Very large flat circulare object underview.

content.detailedDescription: I was photographing clouds with my cell phone. in between layers of cloud was what i thought a star until i went inside and zoomed in. the circle with a hole on the center was clearly not a star. i was in front of my house in new ellenton,  s. c. in aiken county. i enjoy photographing the sky,  stars moon and clouds. but i have never seen this before.
content.summary: Round circle

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my car in front of my house one night around 1-2am on a weekday. i was on the phone with my girlfriend at the time. i lived at my parents at the time and i smoke and i cant smoke in the house so i sat in my car on the phone and smoked before i went inside. im sitting there for a while, i had my seat laid back pretty far to be comfortable, and so i can see out of the passenger side windows. as im talking i kinda noticed something out of the corner of my eye, i looked really quick and saw nothing and kept talking, i thought nothing of it. a few more minutes pass and i saw something again. i looked, saw nothing, then i thought i might of caught a glimpse of a meteorite, as i have seen those before. 

i tell my g/f that i thought i saw a meteorite. we keep talking, and just a few more moments later i saw something again and this time it was there. it was a point of light moving around erratically. i got out of the car and stood on the sidewalk looking at it. it looked like it was closer than what it was. i thought it was a bat flying around near a street light/power line that was in my backyard, i was in the front. i kept watching to see if i could hear it making any noise because sometimes bats will make a noise, i looked to see if i could see wings flapping, i could see nothing. it was just a point of like bluish white light, and bats don't emit light, and i could not see the reflection of the street light on the bat. then the light moved west and up higher in the sky kinda over my house, and thats when i realized it wasn't a bat.

it looked like a fly zipping around, moving very fast and going all across the sky. and it looked like it was almost in orbit it was so high up. it would shoot straight up and i could tell then how high up it was. i've been skydiving and have flown so i kind of have a general idea of how high things are and i know the atmosphere ends at about 90-100k ft. it had to close to this. i could not see a shape or how big it was. then all of a sudden a second light appeared out of know where, i feel like it might of came out of the west. but now these 2 lights are interacting with each other, flying around like house flies chasing each other flying across the sky at high rates of speed, changing directions without stopping. i was in awe, i think i got off the phone at some point. there was no noise at all, no planes, and i live near an airport and i see several planes everyday and at night. there were no cars coming down the street or passing on the adjacent street, it was just quiet and eery. i was the only one outside.

then a third light appeared. same color as the others, bluish-white. they all flew around doing the same things, it was very humbling because i thought i knew that what i was seeing was something that humans cannot and have not made that was being controlled intelligently by something, i have always been a believer. and it seemed like sometimes i could see a trail of sparkles/glitter when they would shoot in a straight line across the sky at a high rate of speed, then the sparkle/glitter would fade out. one compelling moment i remember distinctly. 

all three points of light gathered into a formation, a horizontal line pretty close to each other, paused, and shot up simultaneously faster than anything i had ever seen before. it was like 0-7k/mph in an instant. the middle light continued upward and the left light veered off to the left and the right light veered off to the right. i was frozen at this point. then they all came back together, zipping around again. i remembered we had a video camera in the house, i went to get it from my parents room and i think the battery was dead. i called a couple friends to tell them and nobody answered, i tried to wake my parents up but they werent interested. when i came back outside there were only 2 lights, and they were kinda doing their own thing, not really chasing one another just flying really fast in each direction across the sky, from west to east and vice versa. then another flight flew off and disappeared. and about 3mins later the last light flew off to the east towards the city and i lost it in the light pollution. i live right on the outskirts of the city.


this whole event lasted about 20mins. no cars ever came down the street or passed by. i watched the news the next day to see if anyone else seen what i saw and reported it but nothing was reported.

a year or so later i saw a big bright light hovering maybe a couple thousand feet in the air, relatively low. it was a white light, it made no noise, it hovered, it was stationary. i was with someone else who saw it, we were on the way to the store, about 9-10pm on the north side of town near the airport. when we came out of the store the light was gone. nothing was reported by anyone
content.summary: It was very surreal and chilling in ways, never seen anything like it before or since.

content.detailedDescription:
I see many ships around and above my house and town at night. i noticed this one about a month ago, it is larger, lower and brighter than the others. the first time i noticed it was 10 at night coming out of my workplace about 10 miles from my house. i was amazed as it followed me home staying with me as i drove even stopping when i did. it followed me to the end of my street and hovered there. the video i've attached is it at the end of stree.

since then i notice it every night, whenever i am out and it is dark it appears above, waiting for me to get into my car, then escorts me home. sometimes i can notice it during the day, more as energy.

not everyone can see it, but most of my friends i show can and have gotten it on video. it does not let us take picturues and has hid when i tried to use a telescope.

you can see the brillant colors by the naked eye, but it really puts on a show for video.

i am a lightworker and been told i was acturian and this is one of their ships here to protect me. i am told myself and my group have an important role in the awakening that is happening in the earth. more and more of us will be aware of the et's around us.
content.summary: Ufo seems to escort me around

content.detailedDescription: We were at a relative's house at a party for the children. and after the party was over and everyone went home. we were sitting and talking in the backyard watching the sky when we spotted what looked like moving star's because there was multiple of them then suddenly the red orbs appeared in the sky i immediately took out my phone and started recording what we were seeing and it lasted for about 20to30 minutes.
content.summary: They appeared in the sky, these red orbs of light all flying in the same direction then they would disappear then reappear in the same area.

content.detailedDescription: September 2007 my friend and i left my house to walk to the niehbors 2 miles away and as usual we stared at the sky walking along until we noticed a star blinking wierd we then noticed another. so at this point we started looking for things we knew were there like sattelites and planes. after spotting a couple of both we started watching these 'stars' which by this point had grown brighter than all other objects minus the moon. they then started moing erractically throughout the sky in all directions until they suddenly vanished. about a week later in riverton just about the same thing happened. i was standing on the corner next to my friends setting up a grill. i noticed a star next to the moon which shouldn't be there. it did the same exact thing, zipping about the sky all super crazy for about 25 minutes and then bam it was gone off and away. i would not shut up for weeks and as a result i found i was not the only one to have seen these 'stars' on both nights. also i only asked people i know so it was not a large pool. i did get three credible people who said they observed them on the north side of mille lacs lake in palisade and in a township called burrows outside of brainerd. a lot of people also see b2 bombers around our area and mistake them however they always fly with a triangle pattern 'forward or backward i have seen both'of white lights on the bottom and follow roads and air routes.
content.summary: Lights observed moving erracticaly

content.detailedDescription:
March 19, 1993
marin county california
approximately 10:30pm
very remote area on top of a hill approximately 800-1000ft elevation
no other cars or air traffic visible anywhere
i was with one other person (a woman i was on a date with)

we had parked the car on a rough dirt pullover beside a 2-lane country road that went from the nearby small town of fairfax, ca., up over a large hill and then down to a reservoir then on up to a mountain (approximately 2,800 ft. tall) named mt tamalpias. we were standing outside of the car star gazing and talking. i began telling my friend about a ufo i had witnessed about 5 years prior. as i described the bright red light i saw in the distance hovering on the horizon and then instantly switching directions for about 3 hrs. all those years ago, i noticed a small red light hovering over the treetops of the adjacent ridge line of mt. tamalpias and slowly moving towards the north. as soon as i pointed the light out to her while explaining that what i was describing to her looked exactly like the light (same color and size) that was now visible to us both at that very moment, it began to stop and hover and then continue to move northbound. 
 i kept my eyes fixated on this red light that appeared about the same size as a star in the sky except that it was only about 1-2 miles away from us and hovering just above the treetops. we watched the red light moving north then instantly reverse direction, and then move north instantly again. sometimes it would just instantly stop and hover staying motionless for about 5-15 seconds, before moving either north or south again. then it began to do loops in the sky, quickly rising up and down in a circular pattern of movement. then it would stop and hover before continuing on with this series of erratic maneuvers. after about 15 minutes of watching this red light switching direction back and forth, moving up vertically then dropping down vertically, and then making circulars motions in the sky it finally came to a standstill just above the ridgeline. it hovered there for about 30 seconds than instantly turned into a huge (equal to the size of the sun in the sky but at close range) golden ball of light and than instantly began moving directly towards us in a west by southwest direction. 
   as it came closer the giant ball of golden light morphed into 3 distinct smaller but equal sized balls of golden light, each of which was about 1/3 the size of the original ball of light. the closer it got the more visible the shape of a large black triangle became visible with the 3 golden lights clearly marking the 3 corners of a black elongated triangular craft. it took about 15-20 seconds from when it ballooned into a large golden ball of light to fly over us and disappear right over the curvature of a hill just behind us. what was strange about this craft was how it appeared to morph from one light into 3 lights and then as it got close enough to see the size and shape of the craft the 3 golden lights just disappeared leaving just this massive black elongated triangular craft cruise silently right over our heads at treetop height. as it approached and began passing over head, i began running after it but out was moving too fast to keep up pace with it (approximately 30-40 mph). 
   the craft itself was approximately 300ft long by 100ft wide, solid black with no visible detail what so ever. it glided gently right by and over us without making any noise at all, not even the slightest wind noise.
   within seconds of it disappearing over the hilltop right behind us, and literally about 50 ft. above the ground at that point, another golden ball of light appeared out of seemingly nowhere from the north and flying in a direction that clearly aligned with the flight path of the black triangle. this second craft had colored lights that were visible on either side of its center golden ball of light. as it approached it was clearly and visibly an airplane of some sort that seemed to be following right after the triangle or perhaps even chasing it.
content.summary: Large black triangle that flew slowly and silently at tree height level over my head.

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i,my son and his girlfriend were out for supper at my sons girlfriends parents house. after supper while playing cards between hands i went outside for a cigarette.
  while looking around i noticed to the north an object changing shapes. iwas fascinated as i watched this thing move and change my wife eventually came to get me cuz i was holding the game. i told her you got to come see this. i got out my iphone as it was changing shape again snapped a a couple of pictures. i went to the house and told everyone else that they had to come and see this.
    six of us observed for probably ten minutes as it moved to the north as it was just an orb by this time. we went back inside had some discussion on the subject.
    my sons girlfriends parents have religious convictions as i told them of other lights or objects i have seen i think i rattled them.
   we ended the night and returned to my sons house. the next night april 1 while playing cards at my sons i again went outside for a cigarette and there it was again. i observed this again and took a couple of pictures and again had six witnesses.
  now i am freaked but can not verify. apparently  around 2 am police and fire responded to a burning female woman by the river and i heard that two firemen were injured and hospitalized from some kind of chemical ingestion. i am trying to find out more on this. i live in alberta maybe mufon could find out more about the death. i don't know if this is a related event but iwill get my son to save any clippings he can find on the subject while i further investigate this. i have photos and its not no saucer going to edmonton space center monday april 13 with them. you can cll me for information as i thought about going to the rcmp but not sure that is a good idea i could use some help on this thank you.
content.summary: Went outside for ciggarette notice object changing shapes took photos and got wittnesses

content.detailedDescription: At 8:45 pm my wife and i saw a bright red circular object in the wsw horizon. at first we thought it was a plane. it appeared to be moving in our direction, but it stopped and reversed its direction and arrived back to its original spot. the object then made all sorts of circular moments and weird angled movements. next, it would rise up and then down again hiding in the tree line. it did this movement a couple of times before disappearing. i would guess it was maybe a couple miles from our location. this is the third time we have seen strange things in our night skies that we could not explain. if it wasn't for the fact we go outside to smoke cigarettes we would not have witnessed any of the events.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright, red, round

content.detailedDescription: I was headed to the sushi restaurant "umenoki " on 98th and washington st. in portland oregon. it was my meal break , so i was in a hurry . i pulled in the 98th st entrance and turned north towards the restaurant. right before i pulled into my parking spot , i saw a very beautiful violet purple light shoot up into the sky and then fall back down. similar to a firework , however it appeared to be more solid than not. i wish i could describe the color better , it was very bright and very beautiful . i couldn't tell how far up it went , i kept watching from the restaurant  window but didn't see it again. i then finished eating and went back to work. the weather was a bit weird , i heard there was a funnel cloud the day before to the south of us. the sky was really dark towards the top and more "normal" night lighting below that. i thought it was very cool, i'm not sure what it was . my first thought was it was a new type of light beam they use to get attention to parking lots and such. however it didn't happen again , so i guess that is not what it was.
content.summary: I saw a very bright light go straight up and come straight down. it was a brilliant violet purple.

content.detailedDescription:
L was sitting on my couch with only the light of a few candles looking out of my window which is on the third floor in laughlin nevada with a view of the colorado river ,and three states including nevada, arizona and california .At that time the electricity was turned off at my condo and leaving the window shades opened allowed more light inside.  i noticed an unusual reddish glowing light that appeared coming from the mountains from the west. i got up to get a better view and to make sure it wasn't just a reflection on the window . i know all the lights from all the roads and i know i have never seen lights from those mountains cause there are not any roads or homes located on them. as l was looking at the light another appeared almost next to it. i yelled at my husband david who was in the restroom to hurry and look at the lights with me .He came to the window and opened it up to make sure we were actually seeing what we couldn't explain . i grabbed my phone and turned on the video camera but just held it towards the lights rather than looking through the lens . l didn't want to miss seeing anything  .I wanted to have proof  but i know how poorly my phone camera works in the dark and honestly didn't think anything would show up.  then we started to see more of the lights coming from the same place. i'm going to try to explain the feelings we both felt. not quite fear but i was shaking . more like a special insight into what i thought was a myth. seeing something that explains  faith . ecstaticly afraid.L was thinking is this an attack or are we watching secret experimental technology?    what we witnessed was real .No airplane or helicopter or any motor sounds outside at all and completely quiet inside -no refrigerator motor,no heating motor, no radio or t.V., no clock ticking , just my husband and i and some dogs barking outside .Then the first two lights which started as reddish yellow ish glowing rectangles flew almost side by side towards our direction seemed to stop and hover over bullhead city and the lights glowed whiter and rounder. then the object that was flying a bit behind the other flew in front than above the other and flew in an upward path towards the sky becoming a small pinpoint of white light then disappeared .As we watched the lights disappear another single reddish orange glowing rectangular object appeared from the same mountains in the west followed by a pair of the same glowing objects which flew past the single glowing object and then also hovered.  then all three glowed whiter and smaller .Then following the same path as the first two the u.F.O.S gradually ascended becoming as small as a pinprick of white light then disappeared . as we watched those u.F.O.S disappearing 
 two more glowing pairs and a single glowing objectflew out of the same mountains flying and changing places with each other but all following the exact same path upwards . then three or four single lights came out from the same area and then i lost count of exactly how many were in the sky at that one time. as the last few disappeared in the same pinpoint of space the final pair and single object flying out of the same area also flew by following the same path as all the others. what my husband and i observed that evening was definitely not like any aircraft i have ever seen flying anywhere .The lights glowed and there weren't any blinking lights on any of them . the abrupt 45 degree angle which they flew going up and how quickly they grew smaller was like only a super fast jet or even a rocket ship could do. and all completely disappeared unlike any other aircraft could. the glow was not reflecting light like a balloon or another floating object or birds . we heard no sounds or rumble of a jet engine or any helicopter noise. l have flown .Many times as far as singapore in large jets and flown with my father who is a pilot in small planes. i have lived in big cities like chicago and las vegas near busy airports and with busy police helicopter noise and have many times sat gazing at the planes in the sky. these aircraft l cannot explain . l have seen shooting stars. definitely not that.All these lights ascended and all to the exactsame spot. also our condo is not in any aircraft path and the rare occasion we see or hear any aircraft noise has been a helicopter and that has been only twice in a year l have heard one. bullhead city airport is east and i have never seen a plane anywhere from my window .My husband and i assumed that we couldn't have been the only ones who watched the lights and checked out the newspapers and t.V. news the next day and talked to neighbors and friends in the area but no one else saw anything .And when we did talk about what we saw it was apparent no one believed us. however that next day we were walking down the laughlin casino riverwalk and sat on a bench talking to a couple visiting from orange county who said that they saw some very unusual flying objects around noon, as they were driving past searchlight,nv and thought it was an attack of some kind and felt afraid .Since that day i have not found any report of any sightings that day. i'm reporting it now and will attach the video of it. the lights mostly seen on the video are the lights from our condos across from our building and the lights from bullhead city but if you look above those lights you can see the lights from the u.F.O.S. i just hope maybe you can enhance the pictures and see more than can actually be seen by just  watching it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw two,then more, red orange  glowing rectangular objects flying from the west hovered then flew the same path up  till each  light vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside with two other friends. my one friend was smoking and the other and i were just standing around, hanging out with him. my buddy and i love to look at the sky, and i was looking up when i noticed these three big, bright white lights in a vertical line in the sky. i pointed to it, and said, "hey man, look at that." initially i thought the object was an airplane, but airplanes do not have three bright lights in a vertical line. another thing i immediately noticed was that there was no sound. airplanes make a noise; this craft was silent. there were three really bright lights, obviously with a connecting structure. the ufo was flying in a straight line, silently. initially it as really far off in the distance but it quickly approached. it was flying way lower than a usual airplane in our area would. my friends and i looked at the craft, and it just kept getting closer. i started to experience fear, and i think the others did, too. the object was getting way too close for comfort. so we all agreed to go inside. i was freaked out for the rest of the night.
content.summary: Three bright white lights in a line with obvious connecting structure

stars. definitely not that.All these lights ascended and all to the exactsame spot. also our condo is not in any aircraft path and the rare occasion we see or hear any aircraft noise has been a helicopter and that has been only twice in a year l have heard one. bullhead city airport is east and i have never seen a plane anywhere from my window .My husband and i assumed that we couldn't have been the only ones who watched the lights and checked out the newspapers and t.V. news the next day and talked to neighbors and friends in the area but no one else saw anything .And when we did talk about what we saw it was apparent no one believed us. however that next day we were walking down the laughlin casino riverwalk and sat on a bench talking to a couple visiting from orange county who said that they saw some very unusual flying objects around noon, as they were driving past searchlight,nv and thought it was an attack of some kind and felt afraid .Since that day i have not found any report of any sightings that day. i'm reporting it now and will attach the video of it. the lights mostly seen on the video are the lights from our condos across from our building and the lights from bullhead city but if you look above those lights you can see the lights from the u.F.O.S. i just hope maybe you can enhance the pictures and see more than can actually be seen by just  watching it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw two,then more, red orange  glowing rectangular objects flying from the west hovered then flew the same path up  till each  light vanished

content.detailedDescription: I have 2 photos of a very distinct acorn shaped object descending with rotating lights and 4 distinct under lights taken a minute apart. i have a 3rd photo taken of a similar object taken at the same place a year later. i will only show the photos after i have talked with someone. after having a lifelong interest in ufo's and watching every program available. i've never seen anything close to these. i have a background in digital photography and manipulation. these are 100% authentic, time stamped and the person that took them has only shown me. i know they are real. please contact me. i'm trying to find someone that can enhance them more than i can. my capabilities clear them up enough to scare me. no joke, i'm wasting no ones time.
content.summary: Photos of acorn shaped craft with 4 big undetlights decending from behind

1 in my backyard

content.detailedDescription: Was at state park looking at campsites for later trips. was traveling by car and was nearing the farthest part of the park near the river. i saw a group of buzzards flying around as it was a very breezy day. i was just watching them as they were flying in the breeze when beyond them i noticed a blackish round object floating in the sky. i had my friend(driver at the  time) drive up to top of hill to get better look. as i got to top of hill. the boject was still in same place. birds had moved on to different part of sky. no noise or any movement was made. i could see the sunlight reflecting off the western side (left) of the object so i could see it was round ball like object. i viewed it to the north west direction for a period of 30 minutes without any movement from object. i know what a blimp looks like and balloons and hotair balloons look like and being a very breezy day..This could not have been any of those. i dont know what it was but it didnt behave as any know conventional aircraft. i took three pictures and two videos of it from different angles of it. when i went to leave the area to head home we left the ridge and when i got back to the original spot where i spotted the object i looked back and object was gone..
content.summary: Flock of buzzards cought my attention but behind birds i saw round black object. it didnt move whats so ever but just hovered..

content.detailedDescription:
I've already submitted a detailed account of what happened via my computer in the same forum, that said, i will keep this very brief, as i don't have the time if this correspondence should have the same fate!!
was grilling at 8pm. on 3/29/15 yes we eat late.  i look up in the sky on a regular basis as we live in close proximity to whitham air field, or stuart air field whichever, as i like to make sure no plane's are about to use are condo as a landing strip!  that night my wife and i saw a boomerang object up in the sky, hovered, bright light's all around, not moving, no sound, plane's can't do, nor can helicopter's, simply put, have no idea!
so i took many, many pictures, as there are about 10 in our air space every night since at all different altitude's  funny thing to, not one plane was flying that night, which was sunday and is usually a very busy night for privet plan's, strange! what we did hear where sorworsky helicopter's (i happen to know there sound, as there built where we lived for 11 year's in jupiter fl.), flying around all night, and early morning, and on another occasion 4/4/15., & the reason i know that is because it was the sat. night of the ncaab final 4!
now there are many more, my picture's have some truly remarkable image's.  i have no agenda other than to pass along an account for human curiosity.  if you would like to see these while there here, i wouldn't wait!  ps. will submit picture's and video if you wish to correspond, thank you! 

sincerely,
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: They have been here every night now for 1 week and 4 day's. as there have been no cloud's at night!

content.detailedDescription: We were spending a week at a hunting camp i saw movement out the window well after dark so i went outside & saw a ufo hovering about 40 ft over me. we had previously seen several before in the sky. this ship defied gravity as there was no noise & no air movement. i have flown in the us air force. blue &white lights flashed accross the front of the craft. they turned on a dark blue light on me which froze me in place and all i could move was my eyes to follow what they were doing. a door evidently opened on the other side of the craft and they turned on a light blue light from the craft to the camp and two human figures man & woman dressed in full tights with only there eyes showing drifted down this light to the second floor of the camp and went right thru the solid wall. they came out carrying my son and took him back to their craft for one half hour i guess before taking him back to his bed. the craft took off with no noise no heat but like the speed of light.     i went inside to check my son and could not wake him up but he had a small surgury  under his penis my sons personallity changed a great deal after this to where i even wondered if we got our own son back. during this abduction my wife sat reading in the camp and saw nothing and heard nothing.This area was a hotbed for ufo at that time and nobody talked about it as a local neibor was abducted and insisted on her story as true and they put her in a mental hospital where she died years later. i saw a landed ufo a year later and saw occupants outside the craft and i know how & where they hide to land rest and relax & even caught one sleeping. for the above  reasons i have never told anyone before not even my ex wife or my son. there is a lot more to this story that cannot be told here and my wife believes i could face danger for trying to get the truth out.  the woman that lives in the home where my son was abducted was also abducted years later and has told me she is willing to talk to someone investigating it.
content.summary: My  4 year old son was abducted scarred and returned unconsious.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work along the 403, i was driving at about 120km/hr the time was 3:21am at the time of the sighting. i was between ancaster and brantford going east towards brantford. 

i noticed a bright light appear past the trees to my right. the light was bright, as bright as a street lamp it didn't move at all that i could tell. i thought it was weird when the light appeared and in my head i thought it was something. i even said to myself, "if you're something then do something." 

i don't recall driving past the light but i soon got an urge to peer ahead through my windshield. that was when i saw this large object it was like a cross between boomerang and egg shaped and i really don't think it was a plane. it was literally just above the trees and it moved slowly north. it had white lights flashing in sequence at each end of the craft a white light at its tip and two stripes of blue light running parallel along it's under belly. 

it was silent but i have to say that i was listening to music too and it is possible that my music could drown out any noise it made. however i would think a plane at that low an altitude would be heard over the volume of my music. 

the craft moved right over top of me as i drove underneath it. i was amazed, i kept looking in my rear-view mirror and saw the white lights still flashing in sequence. there were other vehicles on the highway too i remember seeing a semi truck driving in the opposite direction towards hamilton. 

i felt like i was seeing something special and the weird thing is that just before the sighting i got this weird feeling of intuition that i was about to encounter something. i've never really felt that before. 

i lost sight of the object as i drove away from it. the last sight i had of the object was in my rear-view mirror and it had only traveled to the grassy ditch that separates the highway.
content.summary: A large craft with lights rose over the trees, flew slow over my head i was driving

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my dog out because she had to go.  there is no light pollution in the area and i do not use the flood lights at night because it spoils my view on clear nights.  i turned on the garage lights (florescent tubes)and walked out the back door of the garage.  my eyes adjusted to the darkness (approximately 3 mins) and i started looking at cassiopeia and the big dipper like i do on most nights.

i was facing east, cassiopeia was to my left (north) and the big dipper just above me and towards the east slightly.  there were no aircraft in my field of vision at the time, and i had switched my view between the 2 constellations a couple times slowly.  i was looking at the handle of the big dipper attempting to remember the names of the twin stars (mizar and alcor)in the handle. 

by this time i had been outside for approximately 7 mins.  i was slowly turning my head back towards cassiopeia when (i can't call it a flash, because that's not what it was) a perfectly circular white light roughly 30 times the size of the back ground starlight suddenly appeared, then disappeared about 2 degrees north of mizar and alcor and roughly a degree east. 

the magnitude of the light was roughly 300 times that of the back ground starlight, and at a guess i would say was at an altitude of about 40-50,000 ft.  i continued to watch the area and a few seconds later (no more than 30 seconds) roughly a quarter of a degree to the north another white circular light appeared and disappeared just as quickly, but it was only about 10 times the size of the background stars and appeared to be at about 60-70,000 ft in altitude and the magnitude was considerably less. 

i watched for another 5 mins, but no other light appeared, however, a satellite (moving from a westerly to easterly direction) came into view traveling toward where the lights occurred.  this was not an earth grazer nor a conventional aircraft.  i am a certified airframe and powerplant technician by the faa and have worked at multiple international airports and repair facilities throughout the u.S. and i have seen numerous earth grazers and other natural phenomena.
content.summary: Perfectly circular white light
